mapper.select: SELECT id, email, name, created_at FROM "User" ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "User" (email, name, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, now())
mapper.sql: b.id as book_id, b.title, count(*) AS count, max(b.price) * count(*) AS amount, row_number() over (order by count(*) desc) as ranking

SELECT
FROM bookstore.book b LEFT JOIN bookstore.book_order s ON s.book_id = b.id AND s.order_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY b.id, b.title order by amount desc
